review_data.title: Great Pho!
review_data.content: We found the ambiance of the restaurant lovely. Waiters were caring and friendly. We loved the appetisers and the pho. Worth going back.

review_data.title: You won't regret
review_data.content: Excellent food combined with a quick and courteous service makes our lunch a great experience. We will certainly come back.

review_data.title: Great Restaurant with Authentic Food
review_data.content: Great restaurant with friendly host. The interior and exterior area of the restaurant is very nice. Food is very tasty and authentic and the prices are – for Zurich – quite moderate. We had the papaya salad and the Vietnamese spring rolls as a starter...More

review_data.title: Scrumptious!
review_data.content: I've been living in Switzerland for one month now. So far, it's the best restaurant food I've tasted. The Shaking beef is incredible. Delicious!

review_data.title: Nice lunch
review_data.content: We had our lunch in this venue last Monday. I ordered a Bento box 1 and my wife a Vietnamese soup. Both were good and tasty. The staff is friendly and the service pretty quick. The lunch menues are reasonably priced and the location ideal....More
